code: import React from'react';import recepies from'../recipes';import Swal from'sweetalert2';import{jsx as _jsx}from"react/jsx-runtime";import{jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";var Menu=function Menu(){var handleOrder=function handleOrder(id){console.log(id,"id is clicked");Swal.fire({title:"Are you sure?",text:"You won't be able to revert this!",icon:"warning",showCancelButton:true,confirmButtonColor:"#3085d6",cancelButtonColor:"#d33",confirmButtonText:"Yes, order it!"}).then(function(result){if(result.isConfirmed){Swal.fire({title:"Ordered!",text:"Your order has been processing.",icon:"success"});}});};return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"menu-container",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"menu-header",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h2",{children:"This week specials!!"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("button",{children:"Order Menu"})]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"cards",children:recepies.map(function(recipe){return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"menu-items",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("img",{src:recipe.image,alt:""}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"menu-content",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"heading",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h5",{children:recipe.title}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("p",{children:recepies.price})]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("p",{children:recipe.description}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("button",{className:"orderbtn",onClick:function onClick(){return handleOrder(recipe.id);},children:"Order Now"})]})]},recipe.id);})})]});};export default Menu;
